dc_description_s: View over the city of Bathurst in 1877, detailing particular houses and landscapes.   At bottom centre of map: Bathurst, 100 years a city, 1885-1985.   Facsimile. Inset views at corners of central map: All Saints Cathedral -- New Public Buildings -- Town Hall -- St. Stanislaus College.|46 x 63 centimeters|Scale not given.|City Maps
